channel.title: Posts on RISC-V @ HM
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on RISC-V @ HM

item.title: VS Code Venus RISC-V extension 1.0.0 released
item.description: We have released the first public stable version of our VS Code extension that is based on the RISC-V extension. You only need this extension and no further tools to get started with learning RISC-V assembly.

item.title: Munich Meetup Presentation
item.description: The first RISC-V Munich meetup has been co-organized at Munich University of Applied Sciences. The second edition was organized as a virtual event and Stefan Wallentowitz presented recent updates of our RISC-V curriculum integration.

item.title: RISC-V Summit Presentation
item.description: Stefan Wallentowitz took the stage at the RISC-V Summit in December 2019 in San Jose. He has presented our ongoing work on integrating RISC-V into our curriculum. You can find the presentation on Youtube:
